issue.title: [Go] Implement the rest of the typed array builders in NewBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9365](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9365). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The NewBuilder function currently is missing a few of the already implemented array types.

 

I ran into this issue when using `NewStructBuilder` because it internally calls `NewBuilder`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9365?focusedCommentId=17153765) by Sebastien Binet (sbinet):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7670
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7670>
